page.title: 12FARM CROPS (CONT'D)+MACHINES
page.content:
AND LUBRICATION FROM THE CRUSHED AND REFINED SEEDS, AND PEAS WHICH ARE PROCESSED FOR HUMAN CONSUMPTION. {HAY AND SILAGE.}THESE METHODS OF PRESERVING GRASS FOR WINTER ANIMAL FEED ARE USED IN OUR SURVEY AREA, SILAGE IS MORE POPULAR.
{FARM MACHINERY.}THE MAJOR ITEMS OF MACHINERY NEEDED TO RUN THE 445ha. FARM STUDIED WERE; 15 TRACTORS 2 COMBINE HARVESTERS 1 POTATO HARVESTER 1 SUGAR BEET HARVESTER 1 FORAGE HARVESTER (FOR SILAGE) 1 PLOUGH 1 SOIL CULTIVATOR ALSO MANY SMALLER MACHINES SUCH AS; MOWERS, SPRAYERS, IRRIGATORS AND TRAILERS.
